    • Uses of Location in domain.locations.functional

      Subclasses of Location in domain.locations.functional 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Control
      Functional location, that controls the movement of the spaceship.
      class  Laser
      Functional location, that uses a laser to destroy small fragments
      class  Net
      Functional location, that utilizes nets to clear medium fragments.
      class  Outside
      Functional location, where the player can repair the spaceship.
      class  Oxygen
      Functional location, that refuels oxygen.
      class  Personal
      Functional location, the personal room of spaceman Spice.
      class  Scanning
      Functional location, where fragments can be identified.
